Crypto.c File Reference

The file implements the Crypto Driver for the XWR16xx/XWR18xx. The file implements the driver to conform to the MCPI standards. More...

Detailed Description

The file implements the Crypto Driver for the XWR16xx/XWR18xx. The file implements the driver to conform to the MCPI standards.
